trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you check in on Foursquare or Swarm. Only works with public check-ins.
This Trigger fires every time you check in with a photo on Foursquare or Swarm. Only works with public check-ins.
This Trigger fires every time you check in to a venue in a specific category on Foursquare or Swarm. It only works with public check-ins.

This trigger fires every time you check in on Foursquare or Swarm
with a single hashtag in the shout (e.g. #IFTTT).

trigger: New check-in by you in area
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you check in on Foursquare or Swarm in an area you specify.

trigger: New check-in by friend in area
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time any friend checks in on Foursquare or Swarm in an area you specify.
